channel.title: ecourchesne on Laboratory of Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (LAND)
channel.description: Recent content in ecourchesne on Laboratory of Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (LAND)

item.description: Eric Courchesne is Professor at the University of California, San Diego (UCSD) in the Department of Neurosciences and is Co-Director, UCSD Autism Center of Excellence. Prof Courchesne is a world leading expert on the neurobiology of autism. His research and the Center are dedicated to uncovering the brain bases and genetic causes of autism. Current MRI studies of autism aim to identify the brain structures that are abnormal at infancy in autism and to discover patterns of abnormal early brain growth.
